item.description:
We will meet in the back parking area of Pier One closest to the trail entry.

For me this will be slow Sunday Jog since I am doing the Providence Marathon on May 3rd. If you have been reluctant to attend because you didn't think you could keep up with a group this week offers a great opportunity to come out and meet some of the regulars. Depending on who attends I plan to run 3-6 miles at an 11:00-12:00 minute pace. Hope to see some new faces that wanna go easy...

Typically we all run at our own level, hopefully as the weather turns nicer we will grow to a point where we have several groups running together at a comfortable pace.
item.name: Pier 1 - Sunday Run
